title: historicalcrypto
author: historicalcrypto
content: Trying to get some ideas on how to slice crypto data that will be of value on historicalcrypto.comJust a side project that's providing no value but I think could be tweaked to do so.Just comparing prices was not goal wanted to get more of an index our of 100 like Google trends, but I am not sure..Can spend a few minutes a week on making it viable if anyone has any feedback or ideas for use.
